alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Lebanon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 9:35PM EDT until September 08 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DAUPHIN AND SOUTHWESTERN LEBANON COUNTIES... At 934 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Campbelltown, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hershey, Palmyra, Annville, Campbelltown, Pleasant Hill, Cleona, Quentin, Timber Hills, Mount Gretna Heights, Lawn, Mount Gretna and Hershey Park. This includes The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 254 to 266. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
